org.eclipse.ui

Interface IViewActionDelegate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IActionDelegate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddMemoryRenderingActionDelegate, RunToLineActionDelegate

    public interface IViewActionDelegate
extends IActionDelegate
    Interface for an action that is contributed into a view's local tool bar, pulldown menu, or popup menu. It extends IActionDelegate and adds an initialization method for connecting the delegate to the view it should work with.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(IViewPart view)
      Initializes this action delegate with the view it will work in.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eclipse.ui.IActionDelegate

        run, selectionChanged

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(IViewPart view)
        Initializes this action delegate with the view it will work in.
        Parameters:
        view - the view that provides the context for this delegate
